title: karuNincuTakidE
sahitya:
karuNincuTakidE samayamayya kari rakSaka nA kali dIrccavayya


anupallavi

  dharalO nIvaNTi daivamu lEdani paramAnandamutO bhajiyincitini


caraNam    kamalAsanAdi sannuta pAda kamanIya shubha shyAmaLa gAtra
kamalA kalatra kanja daLa nEtra amarAdi pOSa Adi venkatEsha
